what: Retrieving Data from a Custom Web API
title: R interface to Champaign–Urbana Mass Transit District Web API
text: cumtd R package provides example implementing using Web API. particular, package case study retrieving data Champaign-Urbana Mass Transit District (‘CUMTD’) Web API, provides realtime information buses. Writing custom wrapper API necessary since realtime General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) available via GTFS Realtime. Thus, wanting know bus arrive time, one must look elsewhere. follow-, package used r-shinydashboard example illustrate real-time API can used shinydashboard.

title: R interface to Champaign–Urbana Mass Transit District Web API
text: trying import data R Web API, preferred approach use httr curl. Using either packages, one can form HTTP requests send Web API receive HTTP responses contain data. Inside response, body portion contains desired data needs converted R data structure.

what: Retrieve API Usage for specific methods — get_api_usage
title: Retrieve API Usage for specific methods — get_api_usage
text: Get summary API usage key.

title: Retrieve API Usage for specific methods — get_api_usage
code: get_api_usage(   method = NULL,   version = NULL,   start_date = NULL,   end_date = NULL )

title: Retrieve API Usage for specific methods — get_api_usage
text: method (optional) single API method want data (e.g. GetDeparturesByStop) version (optional) single API version want data (e.g. 2.1) start_date (optional) first day want data, YYYY-MM-DD format (earlier 2013-02-07) end_date (optional) last day want data, YYYY-MM-DD format (later yesterday)

title: Retrieve API Usage for specific methods — get_api_usage
text: date	    date YYYY-MM-DD format calls	  number requests made method versions	list versions API used given date number	  API version number methods	list API methods used given date within given API version name   	name API method

title: Retrieve a List of CUMTD Bus Departures — get_departures_by_stop
text: stop_id (required) id stop (ex. :1 ) route_id (optional) vector route ids pt (optional) preview time minutes 0 60 (30 default) count (optional) maximum number departures like recieve

title: Retrieve a List of CUMTD Bus Departures — get_departures_by_stop
text: data.frame departure information specific stop: destination	 trip's destination stop expected	     expected departure time bus given stop expected_mins number minutes expected departure time headsign	     information usually shown headsign location	     latitude longitude vehicle is_monitored	 whether vehicle communicating is_scheduled	 whether trip scheduled is_istop	     trip can boarded without fare/pass origin	       trip's origin stop route     	   route information trip scheduled	   scheduled departure time bus given stop stop_id	     id stop bus trip	         trip information departure vehicle_id	   id associated vehicle
